attributes.action: add the Welsh Dragon in the centre of the Union Jack.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Union Jack does not need to be completely changed as St George, St Andrew and St Patrick are aleady represented. The Welsh, however are excluded. The flag of St David does not lend itself to being incorporated, but a small red dragon, outlined in black would make an interesting addition in the centre of the Union Jack and enable the Welsh to feel included.The dragon motif can be added to existing flags at minimal cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
